ygData.subject: Weapon Mold Hoax
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Didn t check on the sketches, but I can vouch that it was a hoax. The IP # s were almost identical - meaning that all the posts about the mold were nothing
ygData.messageBody:
>This is second hand, but one of the posts, said the image of the >molds was
>visibly altered, and that the three people who posted that >they found them
>were all from the same small rural isp. I haven't >verified it, and I
>probably won't I'm not in a big hurry to make >weapons.
>

Didn't check on the sketches, but I can vouch that it was a hoax. The IP #'s
were almost identical - meaning that all the posts about the mold were
nothing more than one person logging in multiple times (perhaps multiple
accounts?) and posting the messages to make it look legit. Also, if you had
a way to look at the "screenshot" closely, you could see a number of things
didn't match meaning the "screenshot" had been doctored.
